screenTitle.detailsSubtitle: Define the main details of your sale.

fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us more about usage, lifespan, etc...
fields.specsSubtitle: Define the exact features of your component.
fields.imagesSubtitle: Upload real photos. Show ports, box, and cosmetic details.
fields.imagesTip: Tip: First photo will be your listing cover.
fields.nameHelpTitle: How to write a good title
fields.nameHelpDesc:
Be brief and technical.
Structure: Brand + Model + Variant.

✅ Good: Asus TUF RTX 3080 10GB
❌ Bad: Selling used cheap graphics card urgent
fields.descriptionHelpDesc:
• Mention real usage time.
• Was it used for mining or just gaming?
• Any recent maintenance (thermal paste)?
• Does it include original box and accessories?
fields.insuranceHelpDesc:
Trust is our priority. Insurance guarantees that if the carrier loses or damages your product, you recover 100% of your money.

By being mandatory, we eliminate risks for you and ensure a fraud-free platform.
fields.packageSizeHelpDesc: Try to use a box similar to this size to facilitate the shipping process. You can easily find them at stationery stores or shops like Office Depot.
fields.shippingPayerSellerHighlight: Great! Your product will stand out.
fields.shippingPayerBuyerTip: Tip: Products with free shipping sell 2x faster.
fields.insuranceWarning: ⚠️ Warning: If you disable insurance, you will be 100% responsible for any losses or damages during shipping.
fields.shippingInsuranceDescription: Selene offers reimbursement for the product receipt value, in case the package arrives damaged, gets lost, or arrives incomplete.
fields.youReceiveHelpTitle: How is what you receive calculated?
fields.youReceiveHelpDescription: The amount considers the commission, shipping logistics, and shipment protection.

tips.price: Tip: Adjust your price strategically to stay competitive and maximize your earnings.

preview.title: Summary
preview.subtitle: This is how your listing will look. Verify everything is correct.
preview.successMessage: Your product has been sent for review.

errors.minImages: Upload at least 1 photo to continue
errors.maxImages: You have reached the photo limit
errors.permissionMessage: We need access to your gallery to upload photos.
errors.uploadFailed: Error uploading images. Please try again.
errors.packageRequired: You must select a package size
errors.quoteFailed: Error calculating shipping. Check your zip code.
errors.cpMissingText: Missing zip code to calculate shipping...

success.title: Listing Created!
success.subtitle: Your product is already in the system, but buyers won't be able to see it until you verify you have it with you.

verify.title: Trust Verification
verify.subtitle: To activate your sale, we need to confirm you have the product in hand.
verify.instruction1: Write your username and today's date on a paper.
verify.instruction2: Place the paper next to the product.
verify.instruction3: Take a clear photo showing both.
verify.success: Evidence sent. We will review your listing soon.

dialogs.title: Discard Listing?
dialogs.message: You have modified images or specifications. If you continue, your product will lose the 'Verified' badge and you will have to send proof again.
